thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Interface Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.07

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Interface Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.07
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Interface Inc:
* INTERFACE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q4 SALES ROSE 11.1 PERCENT TO $266.2 MILLION * IS TARGETING TO ACHIEVE 3% - 5% ORGANIC SALES GROWTH IN 2018
* IS TARGETING GROSS PROFIT MARGIN OF 39% - 39.5% IN 2018
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $50 MILLION TO $60 MILLION
* EXPECTS STRONGEST OPERATING INCOME GROWTH IN Q2, Q3 OF 2018, WITH SOFTER GROWTH IN Q1, Q4
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $256.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
